name: The United Maid
startIntroPart1: Hail Empire! All hail for the maid! It's time to make the world look back, it's time to control the world! Maid is not lowly job, we will build new order for the world. It time to rise all sisters!
startIntroPart2: The United Maid rise from mid world war, led by Cordelia, a maid and also is a great general. With assistance from her master and other general below her master, the The United Maid hopes to bring respect to Maid, and set the new rule for the world. Can they the reach it and become the winners?
introduction: Cordelia of the United Maid, nice to meet you.
uniqueName: Order of lady Cordelia - Maid war policies
uniques: +[15]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Friendly Land]
